data.question: What is the empirical formula of TABD-MOF-1?
What is the yield percentage of TABD-MOF-2 based on Ni?
What is the calculated density of TABD-MOF-3?
Is the crystal system of TABD-MOF-1 triclinic?
Does the synthesis of TABD-MOFs involve heating a solution mixture at 85 °C for 1 day?
Is the detection limit of NTO calculated to be 4 × 10^-8 mol/L?
What is the excitation wavelength used for fluorescence spectra measurement of TABD-MOFs?
What is the fluorescence quantum yield (ΦF) of TABD-MOF-1?
Can TABD-MOF-3 selectively sense 5-nitro-2,4-dihydro-3H-1,2,4-triazole-3-one with high sensitivity?
What is the role of C–H···π interactions in the structure of TABD-MOFs?
data.answer: They help form extended 3D structures by conjugating 1D chains or 2D sheets.

data.question: Are the PXRD patterns of TABD-MOFs consistent with those simulated from their SXRD data?
What is the main feature of heterocyclic compounds that allows for the detection by TABD-MOFs?
data.answer: The presence of C=N and/or N=N bonds in the heterocyclic rings.

data.question: Does the addition of NTO to TABD-MOF suspensions in THF result in emission changes?
What happens to the emission when a large amount of hexane is added to the mixture of TABD-MOF suspension and NTO in THF?
Is the detection of NTO by TABD-MOFs validated by UV-Vis spectroscopy?
What is the role of competitive coordination substitution in the detection mechanism of TABD-MOFs?
data.answer: It leads to the release of AIE molecules which then reassemble to form emissive aggregates.

data.question: Do common organic molecules and nitroaromatics interfere with the sensing results of TABD-MOF-3?
What is the detection limit of NTO in the fluorescence titration experiment?
Can the original fluorescence of the organic linkers in TABD-MOFs be recovered through competitive coordination substitution?
What is the significance of aggregation-induced emission (AIE) characteristics in the design of TABD-MOF probes?
data.answer: AIE characteristics allow for the design of fluorescence turn-on probes.
